name: Plated Target: Rhythm of War
description: A shooting target in the likeness of an Abyss Mage â€” a common sight around the Flower-Feather Clan. The target's interior is lined with metal plates, making it exceptionally durable. Even rounds capable of shattering an Abyss Mage's Elemental Ward struggle to inflict meaningful damage upon it.\nWhen struck by a bullet, the target emits a crisp ringing sound, allowing a shooter to create a pleasant rhythm with consecutive shots. Of course, just as mastering an instrument requires daily practice, achieving this "rhythm of war" requires consistent effort...
